Package eg.document

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CursorPositionReadable
    The interface to read the numbers of the line and the column where the cursor is located
    SelectionStateReadable
    The interface to read if text is selected or not
    UndoableStateReadable
    The interface read if edits can or cannot be undone and/or redone.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoIndent
    The auto-indentation which works with spaces.
    FileDocument
    Represents the document that is either initialized with a language and which a file may be assigned to afterwards or is initialized with a file which defines the then unchangeable language.
    LineNumberDocument
    The document that contains line numbers.
    TextDocument
    The text document that is edited.
    TypingEdit
    Mediates between the editing of the text document and the actions that happen in response.
    UndoEdit
    The undo and redo editing.
